name: Steve Alexander
title: CXO @ MVRK - Integrated + Events + Experiential + Creative Technology

experience.title: Director, Orlando
description: Powered by Google for Entrepreneurs, Startup Grind is a global startup community designed to educate, inspire, and connect entrepreneurs.
Startup Grind aims to build a connected network of vibrant startup communities to help fuel innovation, economic growth and prosperity at the local level.

experience.title: Co-Founder / Principal
description: Therewolf is a social experience discovery platform allowing consumers to intelligently discover experiences/destinations of interest, while providing real-time analytics to marketers.

experience.title: CXO - Creative/Experiential
description: MVRK, a WPI agency, is an innovative integrated, experiential, and location-based entertainment studio that perfectly blends thoughtful design, strategy, creative technology, and engineering to create unforgettable experiential storytelling.
Notable partners include: Disney, Hulu, NHL, Amazon, Google, General Mills, The North Face, Intel, and many others.
